description:
Sky Resort at the peak of the island`s mountain is finally open! Howard orders Rio and the others to work at Sky Resort. From the vast casino floor to the hologram theater and the thrilling extreme slider, the resort is full of various cutting edge attractions. They cannot believe their eyes when they meet Linda, the robot dealer of the flying resort. However, a group of suspicious figures have their eyes on Rio during the grand opening ceremony.
Source: crunchyroll
